title: Arboriculture
description: Theory and practice for the care and management of ornamental trees. Selection, planting, establishment, maintenance of specimen trees. Professional use of ropes and safety equipment. Tree evaluation, scheduling cultural practices, bracing, cabling, specialty hand and power equipment operation, safety regulations. 2 lectures, 2 laboratories.
prerequisites: EHS 123, EHS 231, and EHS 232 or NR 208 for FNR majors
